1. Objective: Improve Worker Safety and Reduce Accidents
* Develop an AI-powered education platform, PREVENT-IA, that provides personalized training to workers with risk activities.
* Utilize AI to evaluate learning outcomes, generate content from updated sources, and complement content with verified sources to ensure workers receive accurate and relevant information.
* Incorporate a chat for resolving doubts, report generation, and user profile management to facilitate communication and improve user experience.
* Integrate corporate content and assign training to workers to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
* Monitor training tracking and on-site training access to assess progress and identify areas for improvement.
2. Objective: Enhance Architecture and Scalability
* Utilize AWS, cloud computing, and autoscaling groups to ensure scalability and reliability.
* Implement CI/CD, secrets management, and REST API to streamline development and deployment processes.
* Leverage UI/UX design tools such as Figma and React to create user-friendly interfaces.
* Integrate with Jira, Github, and Email to facilitate collaboration and communication among the development team.
* Utilize Python and pgVector for data processing and analysis.
* Implement GPT for natural language processing and content generation.
3. Objective: Mitigate Risks and Ensure Compliance
* Address negative public opinion on AI by promoting the benefits of AI-powered education and ensuring transparency in AI model usage.
* Implement energy-efficient algorithms and practices to minimize energy consumption.
* Establish partnerships with AI model providers to reduce dependence on third-party providers.
* Conduct user testing and feedback sessions to ensure interfaces are user-friendly and intuitive.
* Develop a learning results dashboard to measure training quality and effectiveness.
* Stay up-to-date with AI use regulations and ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices.
* Target specific markets and user segments, including managers, certification candidates, site managers, transporters, logistics, commissioning, and assembly.
